title: Green Fine Salad Co.
typeOfFood: American, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual salad restaurant with a few outlets in this city. Create-your-own salad with choice of dressing and greens. Add tempeh or baked tofu for extra charge. Salads are tossed and made in front of customers. Also makes hand-held salad sandwiches with a salad folded into a warm griddled tortilla.
